attributes.action: Respect Our Police Force with fair increases in salary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our Police are put under ever-increasing risk of danger due to government failures in dealing with  National Security. Police can't go on strike so ordinary people who often need their help should sign this petition and ask the government to give the Police a decent salary increase to reflect the danger they are constantly facing,protecting our Communities. Thus ensuring that they can at the very least, keep up with the cost of living.
